PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2003-05712003-04-30TC,  ,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActFinancial Administration Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Transport of the following persons as directors of the Board of Directors of Ridley Terminals Inc., to hold office during pleasure, for a term of three years. (RHODA R. WITHERLY, Prince Rupert, British Columbia, in the place of Vincent Arimare, whose term has expired; and WILLIAM J. SMITH, Prince Rupert, British Columbia, in the place of Raymond Clarence Jones, whose term has expired)
AttachmentsAttachment
